quit:
Return to the main menu?
Your progress will be
saved.
clear_data:
Are you sure you want
to delete this save
file? You cannot undo
this!
npc0:
We are the keepers of
the Graveyard. Our
job is to bury dreams
that come here to die.

However, the Great
Dreamer told us to dig
you up and give you a
life. For what reason,
we do not know.

Nonetheless, there is a
portal east from here.
It will take you to
the World of Dream.

You can find some use-
ful items on your way
there. You can keep
them if you wish.
npc1:
There is also the Old
Graveyard, where we
bury the nightmares.
How to get there, I
have no idea.

Just pray you never
need to go there.
item0:
It reminds you of your child-
hood. What a dummy you were!
item1:
You obtain the SWORD OF UN-
PREDICTABLE CONSEQUENCES!

It is a trusty (or was rusty?)
old sword for all types of
violent activites.
item2:
You obtain a FUTURISTIC SCI-FI
HAND CANNON THING!

It is one of those novelty
firearms that you wear like
gloves. Not very practical
but easier to animate than
an ordinary gun.
